author: dkhaywood
msg: BoundedFacet and ImmutableFacet now both implement DisablingInteractionAdvisor.

author: dkhaywood
msg: In process of making facets implement {Validating/Disabling/Hiding}InteractionAdvisor; introduced InteractionType as a discriminator for InteractionContext and generally tidying up the Facet implementations of the disable/validate/hide gump already there.
